Apresentacao.Descricao: Creation of websites, Landing Pages, and effective technological solutions for companies and businesses.
SobreMim.Paragrafos: I have been working for over a year in the field of technology and design to assist companies in their evolution.

My goal is to:
Develop websites, Landing Pages, and technological solutions that help companies, like yours, evolve and grow.
I write clean, reusable, and scalable codes and create websites and Landing Pages, always applying good development practices and design patterns, such as design heuristics.

Descricao: Development and maintenance of a web application focused on agribusiness, using Angular, Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL.
Building an integration API with some project microservices, fostering collaboration between different systems.
Utilization of agile project and task management platform such as Jira and Confluence.
Development of SoftSkills within the team, in dailies, technical analysis meetings, and Business School presentations.
Layout design with SASS, Bootstrap, Material, PrimeNG, among others.

ProjetosDestaque.Label: Featured Project

ProjetosDestaque.Projetos.Descricao: A WEB system for managing agribusiness companies, with authentication module, registrations, notifications, and routines for agribusiness.
A project I did to practice website development about a car dealership.

OutrosProjetos.Projetos.Descricao: Here's the link to access the project demonstrated above. I really liked the result and intend to practice more often with other branches! (Curiosity: the project name is the combination of the 'Angular' technology with the name 'Car' haha)
This was a project I did to train my skills in creating registration modules. The system is simple but it was a good challenge to train my skills in Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL.
A real-time weather and temperature application that queries an API to retrieve weather data from various cities around the world. This is a cool app, try using it :)
A static page I made to put into practice knowledge of JavaScript, adapting a futuristic and dynamic layout/visual. The cards move as you hover over them.
A game of jumping obstacles with Mario. Another fun little project to spend some time :)
This is the backend of a project I did to help my girlfriend organize gifts for her birthday.
